remarks: The ordering of the ` Z/nZ ` structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
znle2.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
znle2.f $e |- F = ( ( ZRHom ` Y ) |` W ) $.
znle2.w $e |- W = if ( N = 0 , ZZ , ( 0 ..^ N ) ) $.
znle2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` Y ) $.
znleval.x $e |- X = ( Base ` Y ) $.
znleval $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( A .<_ B <-> ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ ( `' F ` A ) <_ ( `' F ` B ) ) ) ) $.
